english: Put on a spurt , or you 'll fall behind .
chinese: 加把劲，不然你要落后了。

english: Be modest , otherwise you will lag behind .
I've fallen behind in the career race .
chinese: 在官场的竞赛中，我落后了。

english: You are altogether backward, and below the mark .
My thinking always lags behind reality .
chinese: 我的思想老落后于现实。
落后造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法
我们无形中已落后于预定计划。

english: At the door tom dropped back a step .
The lagging country may be given special treatment .
chinese: 落后国家可以给予特殊待遇。

english: Medicine is always a little behind .
The country is in a backward state .
Illness kept him back in his work .
Backwards, he thought. full speed ahead backwards .
chinese: 一切都落后了，他想，欲速则不达了。

english: Those who left behind, we will help to catch up .
chinese: 那些落后的人，我们将设法帮他们赶上。

english: Japan lags u.s.a. in developing computer technology
chinese: 日本在发展电脑技术方面落后于美国。

english: The backward place has changed into an industrial centre .
chinese: 那落后的地方变成了工业中心。
